title: The PS4’s getting a firmware update today – but don’t expect any new features
text:
The PS4’s getting a firmware update today – but don’t expect any new features 
Published By: Lazygamer.net - Today 
Today, your PlayStation 4 is going to be getting an update. Unlike the last update, which was a major revision, this new firmware, numbered ...
